Weaviate Academy Unit 1: Query Examples (Part 2) 
hi good to see you againin this section we'll continue to take alook at vectors in action by showing youmore examples of real queries inweaviatein an earlier video we talked aboutmaking information dynamicnow we'll take a look at additionalexamples of exactly that we'll show youhow you can use waviate to not onlyretrieve an object but to extract thespecific relevant part of the questionthen we'll also take a look atgenerative search or aviate retrievessearch results and then transforms itbased on a set of instructions beforedelivering them to usthese tools can transform how youinteract with your data and make use ofthe information to bring them to lifeI think you'll find these veryinteresting and really get you excitedfor some Hands-On sections that we'llmove on to nextokay then we'll see you soon
name: Hello Weaviate - Query Examples (Part 2)
